direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle binary data and involve similar exception handling mechanisms.
Both methods process and manipulate the nonce attribute, albeit in different ways (decoding vs. encoding).
The equals method relies on the getDataLength method to compare attribute lengths.
Both methods involve operations on the nonce attribute, though setNonce is more focused on setting the value.
The equals method indirectly relies on getNonce to access the nonce value for comparison.
